availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Bailey Gibson and Catherine Sights. Married to Susan Berry Gibson in Henderson County, Kentucky on October 28, 1851. Father of George Gibson, Elijah Gibson, Alridge Gibson, Thomas Gibson, and Malissa Gibson. Farmer in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 54.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #000576460, p. 123.
Find A Grave, "Tilmon Gibson (Aug 11, 1818-Aug 5, 1898)," Memorial #72938016, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/72938016 (accessed April 9, 2020).
